prompt_text: Every 15 mins choose a random effect on the Office WLED device. Play the effect for 15 secs. Choose random effect, random colors and brightness to 100%. At the end of the 15 sec the WLED light needs to return to exactly what it was before it started.
automation_yaml:
id: office_wled_random_effect_every_15
alias: Office WLED – random 15s burst every 15 min
description: "Every 15 minutes, run a 15-second random full-brightness effect on Office WLED, then restore its previous state."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time_pattern
    minutes: "/15"
conditions: []
action:
  - service: scene.create
    data:
      scene_id: office_wled_before_random
      snapshot_entities:
        - light.wled
  - variables:
      random_r: "{{ range(0, 256) | random }}"
      random_g: "{{ range(0, 256) | random }}"
      random_b: "{{ range(0, 256) | random }}"
      effects:
        - "Solid"
        - "Blink"
        - "Breathe"
        - "Color Wipe"
        - "Rainbow"
      random_effect: "{{ effects | random }}"
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness: 255
      rgb_color:
        - "{{ random_r }}"
        - "{{ random_g }}"
        - "{{ random_b }}"
      effect: "{{ random_effect }}"
  - delay: "00:00:15"
  - service: scene.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: scene.office_wled_before_random
